So good and so authentic!Just walking in you can tell you're about to have a good meal. The ambiance is really nice and homely and the decor really adds to the feel. I love that the menu changed! It lets you know that your meal is fresh and homemade. I got the rigatoni and it was delicious! The pasta was a little al denote but I really liked it. We went for my friends birthday and you have to make a reservation. My favorite part was dessert, though. I got a chocolate cake made with Guinness beer and a cheesecake frosting on top. It was SO GOOD! I definitely recommend for some authentic Italian and all my friends enjoyed it there too!
